titles.title: PREPARE Act of 2025
PREPARE Act of 2025
Preparing Regulators Effectively for a Post-prohibition Adult-use Regulated Environment Act of 2025
To establish a Commission on the Federal Regulation of Cannabis to study a prompt and plausible pathway to the Federal regulation of cannabis, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on the Judiciary, Ways and Means, Agriculture, and Financial Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
